add-browser-sync-dependency.description: Add 'browser-sync' as dev dependency when '@angular-devkit/build-angular:ssr-dev-server' is used, as it is no longer a direct dependency of '@angular-devkit/build-angular'.

use-application-builder.description: Migrate application projects using '@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser' and '@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser-esbuild' to use the '@angular-devkit/build-angular:application' builder. Read more about this here: https://angular.dev/tools/cli/esbuild#using-the-application-builder
